entry.title: Sunday night: Increasing cloudiness. Low minus 20.
entry.summary: Clear. Increasing cloudiness after midnight. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Low minus 20. Wind chill minus 21 this evening and minus 29 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:30 PM AST Sunday 19 February 2023

entry.title: Monday: Periods of snow. High zero.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 near noon. High zero. Wind chill minus 20 in the morning. Forecast issued 4:30 PM AST Sunday 19 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 15.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light in the evening. Wind becoming northwest 20 gusting to 40 overnight. Low minus 15. Wind chill minus 24 overnight. Forecast issued 4:30 PM AST Sunday 19 February 2023
